entry.title: WIND WARNING, Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 a.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
